meanings.definition: Leaving the nest shortly after hatching.
meanings.sent1: The nidifugous chicks quickly ventured out of the nest.
meanings.sent2: The nidifugous baby birds were independent from a young age.
meanings.sent3: The nidifugous fledglings decided it was time to explore the world.
meanings.sent4: The nidifugous hatchlings bravely faced the unknown outside the nest.
meanings.sent5: The image of the nidifugous chicks taking flight stayed with me.

meanings.sent1: The nidifugous flew away from the nest as soon as it could.
meanings.sent2: The nidifugous bird was eager to explore its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The nidifugous creature seemed determined to leave the nest early.
meanings.sent4: The nidifugous avian symbolized freedom and independence.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the nidifugous bird leaving the nest was unforgettable.
